div.p: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?
I imagine my life in 10years far away of here. I love travel and If I have the possibility to go, it will be wonderful.
After that, I'll hope finish my studies with a graduation an find a good job (maybe in an other country).
I wish too, it's a little bit simple, be happy with great relations and maybe a good relationship.
In conlusion, for the moment only the present is important, Carpe Diem.
